Links to default Webel JSF/PrimeFaces test pages

Please feel welcome to copy (only) then rename , re-author (via the XHTML page comment headers), and adapt the JSF/PrimeFaces test pages these link to:

Please DO NOT directly edit FakeEntity, FakeQuery, and ViewBean or you may break the default test pages ! TIP: Please introduce new links with <h:link> to your NEW clearly described test case pages below !
If you have issue numbers for support tickets please include them in your link descriptions(s).
